me wanija, labhadayi karmanthaya merata bihi kala indiya mula samagam wisin thri pudgala eekadhikarayakin yuthuwa deshiya sinamawata kudammage salakilla dakwuwe yayi aragala kala lankiya kala karuwange ugra prayathnaye hethuwen 1972 di jathika chithrapata nithigatha sansthawa pihituwana ladi.ehi palamu samanyadhikariwaraya wu aacharya di.bi.nihalsinhayange aprathihatha dhairyaye hethuwen 70 dashakaya wanahi lankeya sinamawe wanija saha kalathmaka yana depakshayen ma suba prathipala labagath swarnamaya yugaya bawata path wiya.eheth 1978 meratata udgatha wu wiwrutha welenda aarthikaye anitu pala labu chithrapata karmanthaya 80 dashakaye di ugra arbudayakata muna duni. 1983 sita merata awilunu amanushiya jathiwadi ginnen dawi halu wu sinhala sinamawa sahashrakaya labaddi bankaloth wi padu windina suhumbaul karmanthayak bawata pathwi thibuneya.mage paramparawa wanahi 70 dashakaye merata bihiwu swarnamaya uththama kalawen rankiri kata ga suba anagathayaka balaporoththu dalwa 1980 dashakaye di nirmanakaranayata bata paramparawayi.
